name: Slovenian Business and Research Association
goal:
- encourage cooperation between Slovenia, the European Union and its Member States in the domains of business, research and regional policy;
- support members of the association in their full integration into the Union and facilitate their successful participation in Community programmes and initiatives
- facilitate the communication with European institutions, associations, representation offices in the field of business, research and regional policy
- Consulting on relevant EU funding programmes and EU calls for proposals mainly in the domain of research and innovation;
- Informing on partner search and networking with potential partners;
- Support in preparation of project proposals;
- Partnership building and project development;
- Communication with relevant EU institutions and other organisations in the phase of preparing project proposals;
- Organisation of national information days in Slovenia for Horizon 2020 and other EU programmes;
- Dissemination of project results;
- Management of projects on behalf of member or participation as a project partner.
interests: Business and Industry, Culture, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Co-creation of the policy paper on regional food protection – communicated to DG SANCO
- Contributions to the advisory board of the H2020 programme – Science with and for Society
- Communication and feedback to the S3 platform on Smart Specialisation Strategies – this was done through Smart Spec project
- Preparation of the draft working programmes for Horizon 2020 2016-2017 – SBRA was involved through IGLO and ERRIN network
